title: On the Origin of the Readers
content:
Yesterday, bored, I checked where the majority of the traffic to this site comes from. Fascinated, and because I like graphs, I decided to plot a nice pretty Pac Man chart. I made a nice looking graph, but realised too late that it didn’t fit in with my colour scheme.
Anyway, it was interesting enough to be shared. Click on the image for a higher resolution version.



I thought of making some more, but the graph making urge had been satisfied.
